title: A pattern recognition device and pattern recognition methods
abstract: there is provided a pattern recognition apparatus for generating a plurality of systems, and combination of the plurality of systems to improve the recognition performance, comprising a discriminative training session for the construction of model parameters of a second or subsequent system based on an output tendency of a previously constructed model so that it is the previously from the output tendency constructed model differs. When multiple systems are combined together, therefore, the detection performance can be improved.
